extendedInfo.description: FREE to download, VouchAR delivers something special: Savings In Sight. Use your phone as a âmagic windowâ to a world of deals, vouchers, coupons and cheap tickets; Saving you money, time and connecting you with friends. Play with our augmented reality deal engine to find deals on the high street wherever you go.- Save you money- Save you time- Socialise your savings- AR âMagic Windowâ- World wide deal base, more vouchers and deals than anyone else!- Itâs FREE!**This is how we save you money**Weâve partnered with every deal provider we can get our hands on giving you the greatest choice of vouchers available to app-kind! Youâll find local and national deals on Hotels, Tickets, Meals, Drinks, Spas, even Plumbers! You name it weâve got it! Big brands or small! Heart warming deals from Bella Italia, Strada, Cafe Rouge to name a few. 2-for-1 tickets to âWe Will Rock Youâ and even Groupon Deals! Finding you great places to eat, shop or play â¦ or even sleep, whilst saving your precious cash. **This is how we save you time**Weâve taken the hard work out of finding a good deal, VouchAR works hard to understand the type of deals you like most and builds a âDeal Profileâ to your taste. This evolves, becoming your own personalised feed of savings possibilities. We show the deals you want to see.**This how we socialise the vouchers**When we find a great deal or voucher, we love to let our friends in on the secret too! Thatâs why weâve made VouchAR a social tool. Using Facebook, Twitter and Google we bring you closer to your friends and the deals theyâve been enjoying nearby. Add the friends that matter to you. The pals that you like to go out to eat and drink with. Or perhaps the groups that you like to go on adventures with. Out in town and wondering which restaurant your friends saved money in last? That's no problem if you're connected with VouchAR. See where friends are now and join them.**This is the magic**For the uninitiated, Augmented Reality provides a layer of information over live video of the world around you. When you load the Augmented Reality âmagic windowâ you will see the vouchers and coupons floating in the air around you. Point the camera, find a deal. Savings In Sight!We canât wait to see how you start using the app, weâve got loads of plans for the future so we hope youâll join us on this journey!Follow us: @VouchAR,Like us: http://facebook.com/VouchARWant more information? Email us at vouchers@vouchar.netâCor blimey guvnor there are vouchers everywhere!â Pete, London.âAugmented reality is a Great way to browse for local deals and vouchersâ - Rich, ManchesterâI found some canny vouchers in the toon!â - Dan, Newcastle

reviews.title: Doesn\'t load anything

reviews.comment: Tend to travel a lot through work and to date app hasn\'t come up with anything worthwhile.... Very poor.

reviews.comment: Properly pants. Cant even figure out my location which is an integral part of the app. Pffft dont bother with it!

reviews.comment: Rather than fail badly at working out where I am (indoors, so don\'t bother trying gps) why not let me choose a location?

reviews.comment: Rubbish App. Does not have any discounts near my location.

reviews.comment: The \'book a table\' function does not work. You also have to print out the vouchers which makes this app totally useless. Uninstall.

reviews.comment: Can\'t get this to work. Just says this application could not connect to the internet. All other apps connecting to internet without issue.
